SELECT * FROM TB_CUST_INFO WHERE CUST_CODE = #{custCode}

SELECT TRAN_NO, TRAN_ACCT_NO, TRAN_CUST_NAME, TRAN_TYPE, TRAN_AMOUNT, /* 날짜를 '2025-11-21 14:30' 형식의 문자열로 변환 */ TO_CHAR(TRAN_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') as TRAN_DT, TRAN_REC_ACCT_NO, TRAN_REC_NAME, TRAN_REC_BK_CODE, TRAN_MEMO, TRAN_ESIGN_YN FROM TB_CUST_TRAN_HIST WHERE TRAN_ACCT_NO = #{acctNo} ORDER BY TRAN_DT DESC, TRAN_NO DESC
SELECT COUP_NO, COUP_CUST_CODE, COUP_TYPE, COUP_RATE, COUP_ISSUED_DY, COUP_STATUS FROM TB_COUPON WHERE COUP_CUST_CODE = #{custCode} ORDER BY COUP_STATUS DESC, COUP_ISSUED_DY DESC

SELECT th.*, ti.DPST_ID AS dpstId, ti.DPST_NAME AS dpstName, ti.DPST_TYPE AS dpstType, ti.DPST_RATE_TYPE AS dpstRateType, ti.DPST_PART_WDRW_YN AS dpstPartWdrwYn, ti.DPST_ADD_PAY_YN AS dpstAddPayYn, ti.DPST_ADD_PAY_MAX AS dpstAddPayMax, wi.WDRW_MIN_MONTH AS wdrwMinMonth, wi.WDRW_MAX AS wdrwMax, wa.AMT_MIN AS amtMin,
TO_CHAR(dt.LAST_TRAN_DT, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS lastTranDt, dt.FIRST_TRAN_AMT AS dpstDtlInitialbal, dt.TRAN_CNT AS tranCnt
FROM TB_DPST_ACCT_HDR th JOIN TB_DPST_PROD_INFO ti ON th.DPST_HDR_DPST_ID = ti.DPST_ID LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_INFO wi ON th.DPST_HDR_DPST_ID = wi.WDRW_DPST_ID LEFT JOIN TB_DPST_PARTIAL_WDRW_AMT wa ON wa.AMT_DPST_ID = th.DPST_HDR_DPST_ID AND wa.AMT_CURRENCY = th.DPST_HDR_CURRENCY
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT d.DPST_DTL_HDR_NO,
COUNT(*) AS TRAN_CNT, MAX(d.DPST_TRAN_DT) AS LAST_TRAN_DT,
MIN(d.DPST_DTL_AMOUNT) KEEP (DENSE_RANK FIRST ORDER BY d.DPST_TRAN_DT) AS FIRST_TRAN_AMT FROM TB_DPST_ACCT_DTL d GROUP BY d.DPST_DTL_HDR_NO ) dt ON dt.DPST_DTL_HDR_NO = th.DPST_HDR_ACCT_NO
WHERE dpst_hdr_cust_code=#{dpstHdrCustCode} AND dpst_hdr_status=1

SELECT B.DPST_DTL_NO, B.DPST_DTL_TYPE, B.DPST_DTL_AMOUNT, B.DPST_TRAN_DT, B.DPST_DTL_HDR_NO, B.DPST_DTL_ESIGN_YN, B.DPST_DTL_ESIGN_DT, B.DPST_DTL_APPLIED_RATE, A.DPST_HDR_CUST_CODE, A.DPST_HDR_CURRENCY_EXP, A.DPST_HDR_BALANCE FROM TB_DPST_ACCT_HDR A JOIN TB_DPST_ACCT_DTL B ON A.DPST_HDR_ACCT_NO = B.DPST_DTL_HDR_NO WHERE A.DPST_HDR_CUST_CODE = #{dpstHdrCustCode} ORDER BY B.DPST_TRAN_DT DESC
select * from TB_DPST_ACCT_HDR where dpst_hdr_acct_no=#{dpstHdrAcctNo}

select da.*, tfab.BAL_BALANCE as dpstHdrLinkedAcctBal from TB_DPST_ACCT_HDR da JOIN TB_CUST_FRGN_ACCT tcfa ON da.DPST_HDR_EXP_ACCT_NO = tcfa.FRGN_ACCT_NO JOIN TB_FRGN_ACCT_BALANCE tfab ON tcfa.FRGN_ACCT_NO = tfab.BAL_FRGN_ACCT_NO where dpst_hdr_acct_no=#{dpstHdrAcctNo} AND tfab.BAL_CURRENCY = #{dpstHdrCurrency}
SELECT acct_balance FROM TB_CUST_ACCT WHERE ACCT_NO = #{dpstHdrLinkedAcctNo}
SELECT bal_balance, bal_frgn_acct_no FROM TB_FRGN_ACCT_BALANCE WHERE bal_no = #{dpstHdrLinkedAcctNo}
